description:
Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master`s candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!
Bagarre dans le blizzard. Luffy au Chapeau de paille contre la femme des neiges !
Fubuki no Shitou: Mugiwara no Ichimi Tai Yukionna
Схватка во время вьюги! Мугивары против Снежной Девы!
吹雪の死闘 麦わらの一味VS雪女
